modeltools R package

This package is developed and maintained by the Delphi research group headquartered at Carnegie Mellon University and is designed to be used in conjunction with our covidcast and evalcast R packages. The modeltools package provides tools for analyzing the trajectories of COVID-19 signals — namely, those stored in Delphi’s COVIDcast Epidata API — and for building short-term forecasting models.

To get started using the modeltools package, see the Getting started guide.

Get updates from Delphi

You should consider subscribing to Delphi’s API mailing list to receive notifications from us. These include notifications of updates to Delphi’s open-source software, new signals available in Delphi’s API, corrections to reported data, and other updates. The mailing list may also be used to ask general questions.
